item.description: Another holiday Monday--Holiday Mondays are potluck game night at Bobbi's house. We'll start a little earlier so we have time for food and games. 6pm at Bobbi's in south Nashua (just a couple of miles from Killarney's). I'll send directions to my house the day before to everyone who RSVP'd "Yes." Hope to see you there. --b

group.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Nashua Gamers Meeting
